thread.title: Farmer Tim

author: Farmer Tim
title: Farmer Tim
text: Willis had amazing prices for the highly regarded Apache blackberry. They arrived in about 10 days and were shipped in very sturdy packaging with a special gel to keep the roots moist - much better than the sawdust I am used to seeing in packaging. About 3 weeks after planting, roots and shoots began to bust out. Too early to tell the rest of the story, but so far, they are off to a great start. Oh...and they shipped two extra plants. Thanks!
